mapper.select: /* cetusFile.countUserDownloading */ SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CETUS_DOWNLOADS_HIST CDH INNER JOIN CETUS_FILE CF ON CDH.FILE_UID = CF.FILE_UID WHERE CDH.USER_UID = #{userUid} AND CF.FILE_ID = '0' AND CF.SAVED = 'N'

/* cetusFile.getFileInfoById */ SELECT FILE_UID ,FILE_ID ,FILE_NM ,ORG_FILE_NM ,FILE_PATH ,FILE_URL ,FILE_SIZE ,FILE_TYPE ,EXTENSION ,DOWN_CNT ,USE_AT ,REG_DT ,UPDT_DT ,SAVED ,REG_ID FROM CETUS_FILE CF WHERE CF.FILE_ID = #{fileId}
